Description: DivvyCloud base deployment for enterprises. This template deploys by default an ASG with 2 EC2s for DivvyCloud but can segment workers into different ASGs of different capacity

Label.default: Default Networking and Security Deployment Information
Optional Database and Redis Endpoint Overrides

ParameterOverrideEndpoints.default: Overide provided RDS and Redis Endpoints

ParameterDataStackName.Description: Name of stack used to deploy data resources

ParameterEmail.Description: Email address to receive EC2 launch notifications

ParameterHttp.Default: Enter IP address with port if adding proxy

ParameterHttps.Default: Enter IP address with port if adding proxy

ParameterIamRole.Description: ARN of your DivvyCloud instance role. Ex: arn:aws:iam::0123456789:role/DivvyCloud-PowerUser-Role

ParameterInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 HVM instance type for your AWS AZs.
ParameterInstanceType.Description: EC2 HVM instance type (e.g., m4.large, m5.xlarge, etc.).

ParameterKey.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair in this Region.
ParameterKey.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

ParameterNetworkStackName.Description: Name of stack used to deploy network resources

ParameterOverrideASGs.Description: Override to deploy Web Server and Workers using separate ASGs?

ParameterOverrideEndpoints.Description: Override deployed RDS and Redis endpoints?

ParameterOverrideSecurityGroups.Description: Override deployed security groups with provided security groups? | If you're using your own VPC, select yes

ParameterOverrideSubnetGroups.Description: Override deployed subnet groups with provided subnet groups? | If you're using your own VPC, select yes

ParameterSecurityGroupDivvyELB.Description: Group ID of security group for load balancer

ParameterSecurityGroupDivvyWorkers.Description: Group ID of security group for workers

ParameterSubnetDivvy1of2.Description: Subnet ID of subnet 1 for workers

ParameterSubnetDivvy2of2.Description: Subnet ID of subnet 2 for workers

ParameterWebserverInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 HVM instance type for your AWS AZs.
ParameterWebserverInstanceType.Description: EC2 HVM instance type (e.g., c4.large, c5.xlarge, etc.).

ParameterWorkers.ConstraintDescription: Valid range even numbers between 8 and 16 inclusive.
